Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack with your primary weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 3 attack dice.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Khazara
Ship.Ability: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, add +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Maht-H'A
Ship.Ability: Any ship attacking you at Range 1 rolls 1 less attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Reliant
Ship.Ability: You gain +1 attack die when firing at Range 1.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise
Ship.Ability: The USS Enterprise can perform an Action listed on its Action Bar while it has an Auxiliary Power token.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Valdore
Ship.Ability: If you perform a Green Maneuver, add +1 attack die for the remainder of this round.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Apnex
Ship.Ability: ACTION (once/game): Every ship at range 1 sustains 1 damage (including this ship). During the Planning Phase this ship must choose a '1' Maneuver (forward, bank or turn) for the rest of the game.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Gr'oth
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend against a ship at Range 1, roll 1 extra defense die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Negh'var
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within your firing arc at Range 1-2 and roll 3 attack dice. For each [HIT] result disable 1 of that ship's Shields. If possible, you may play Klingon Boarding Party as a free action this turn.

Ship.Title: Kraxon
Ship.Ability: Whenever a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship receives damage you may transfer any amount of that damage to your own Shields, if possible.

Ship.Title: Gor Portas
Ship.Ability: Although you must be Target Locked on a ship to fire a Torpedo at it, you do not need to discard your Target Lock when doing so.

Ship.Title: Krayton
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die this round. You may re-roll all of your blank results once.

Ship.Title: Deep Space 9
Ship.Ability: When firing any torpedoes, do not disable the torpedoes.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Ch'tang
Ship.Ability: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Ship.Title: P.W.B. Aj'Rmr
Ship.Ability: Each time you attack, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice for every damage card assigned to your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Defiant
Ship.Ability: When defending, convert all of your opponent's [CRITICAL] results into [HIT] results.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Kronos One
Ship.Ability: Any ship attacking you at Range 3 rolls 1 less attack die.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Praetus
Ship.Ability: You may use the [CLOAK] Action even if you have no Active Shields. Whenever you choose the [CLOAK] Action, roll 1 attack die. On a [BATTLE STATIONS] result, your Hull sustains 1 Damage.

Ship.Title: 5th Wing Patrol Ship
Ship.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. When defending this round, roll one less defense die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Koraga
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend while Cloaked, roll +1 defense die

Ship.Title: Koranak
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack, you may spend a [SCAN] Token to attack 2 different ships with your Primary Weapon at -2 attack dice each.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Excelsior
Ship.Ability: After you move, if no enemy ships are within Range 1 of your ship, you may perform a [SCAN] action as a free action.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Vo
Ship.Ability: After you move, you may perform an [EVASIVE] action as a free action. If you do so, you cannot attack during this round.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Sutherland
Ship.Ability: When you initiate an attack at range 3, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Ship.Title: Rav Laerst
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if this ship is not Cloaked. You may only use the 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template for this Action.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Equinox
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields. During the End Phase this round, repair all of your damaged Shields.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Somraw
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend, you may convert up to 2 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results into [EVASIVE] results.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Gal Gath'thong
Ship.Ability: When initiating an attack while Cloaked, you may fire Plasma Torpedoes without needing a Target Lock.

Ship.Title: 4th Division Battleship
Ship.Ability: Each round, one other friendly Jem'Hadar ship within Range 1-2 of your ship may perform an Action on their Action Bar as a free Action.

Ship.Title: Akorem
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend, if there is an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship, you may re-roll all of your defense dice once. You must keep the outcome of the 2nd roll.

Ship.Title: Federation Attack Fighter
Ship.Ability: If you initiate an attack at Range 1, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice. [Initial Captain skill 6]

Ship.Title: Hideki Class Attack Fighter
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack, you may make an attack with 2 dice from your rear firing arc. [Initial Captain skill 6]

Ship.Title: Borg Sphere 4270
Ship.Ability: Each time you attack with your Primary Weapon, you may divide your attack between 2 different ships. You may divide your attack dice however you like, but you must roll at least 1 die against each ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Voyager
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 4 attack dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Nistrim Raider
Ship.Ability: When attacking an enemy ship with a Scan token next to it with your Primary Weapon, roll +2 attack dice.

Ship.Title: Bioship Alpha
Ship.Ability: When you attack with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict at least 3 damage, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship.

Ship.Title: Tholia One
Ship.Ability: You may perform the Action listed on the "Energy Web" Upgrade card as a free Action.

Ship.Title: D'Kyr
Ship.Ability: Whenever you initiate an attack against an enemy ship at Range 3, gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Interceptor 5
Ship.Ability: You do not lose your "Perform Actions" step or take damage when you overlap a planet, obstacle or ship base. You may roll defense dice against any minefield.

Ship.Title: Tactical Cube 138
Ship.Ability: The Borg Ablative Hull Armor [BORG] Upgrade costs -3 SP to equip to this ship.

Ship.Title: S'Gorn
Ship.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict at least 1 Critical Damage to the enemy ship's hull, that ship must also discard 1 [CREW] Upgrade (of its choice).

Ship.Title: I.K.S. B'Moth
Ship.Ability: You can perform a Red Maneuver while there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Gavroche
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your [CREW] Upgrades and add +1 attack die to each of your attacks this round for each [CREW] Upgrade you disabled with this Action.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Vorta Vor
Ship.Ability: While you are Cloaked, after you perform a Green Maneuver, you may perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: 3rd Wing Attack Ship
Ship.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase you may disable one of your [CREW] Upgrades to add +1 attack die to your attack.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Yeager
Ship.Ability: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes, you do not need to disable the Photon Torpedoes.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your Active Shields. For each Shield you disabled with this Action, gain +1 attack die for all of your attacks with your Primary Weapon this round.

Ship.Title: Soong
Ship.Ability: After performing a 5 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver, if there are no enemy ships in your forward firing arc, you may perform an [EVASIVE MANEUVERS] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: 2nd Division Cruiser
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend, if you are within Range 1-2 of at least one friendly Jem'Hadar Attack Ship, roll 1 extra defense die.

Ship.Title: Ti'Mur
Ship.Ability: Whenever you initiate an attack, you may disable one of your non-disabled [TECH] Upgrades to add +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Raven
Ship.Ability: Each time you attack or defend, if there is a [SCAN] token beside your ship, your range combat bonuses are doubled.

Ship.Title: Enterprise NX-01
Ship.Ability: You may equip the Enhanced Hull Plating [TECH] Upgrade to your ship for free even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions.

Ship.Title: Ni'Var
Ship.Ability: Whenever you attack an enemy ship at Range 3 with your Primary Weapon, if there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, you gain +1 attack die for that attack.

Ship.Title: Scout 608
Ship.Ability: After you move, you may discard one of your Upgrades to perform an additional Green or White Maneuver. You cannot deploy a [BORG] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

Ship.Title: Borg Starship
Ship.Ability: You cannot deploy a [BORG] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Stargazer
Ship.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may disable 1 of your Active Shields to remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token from beside your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
Ship.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Assimilation Target Prime
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Spend 1 Drone Token to repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

Ship.Title: Bok's Marauder
Ship.Ability: If you performed a Maneuver of 3 or higher this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may add +1 attack die. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Prakesh
Ship.Ability: After you move, if you are within Range 1 of a friendly ship, you may immediately perform one of the Actions listed on your Action Bar as a free Action.

Ship.Title: Relora-Sankur
Ship.Ability: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Scout 255
Ship.Ability: If there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship during the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die. You cannot deploy a [BORG] Upgrade with a cost greater than 5 to this ship.

Ship.Title: Tal'Kir
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend, during the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll. If you do so, place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Val Jean
Ship.Ability: During the Modify Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may disable up to 3 of your Upgrades to add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll for each Upgrade you disabled with this card.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Avatar of Tomed
Ship.Ability: When you perform a [CLOAK] Action, you may immediately perform a [REGENERATE] Action as a free Action. If you do so, you cannot attack that round.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Avatar of Tomed
Ship.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may roll +1 attack die. If you do so, suffer 1 damage to your Hull.

Ship.Title: Queen Vessel Prime
Ship.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, your ship, or 1 friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship, may spend a Scan Token from beside this ship to gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-E
Ship.Ability: You may fire a Torpedo at an enemy ship without needing a Target Lock. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Assimilated Vessel 80279
Ship.Ability: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may spend 3 Drone Tokens to choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them (even if they have already been re-rolled).

Ship.Title: Korok's Bird-of-Prey
Ship.Ability: When you initiate an attack at Range 1, while Cloaked, your opponent rolls -1 defense die. You cannot deploy this card to the same fleet as "Assimilated Vessel 80279."

Ship.Title: Tactical Cube 001
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard up to 3 of your [BORG] Upgrades. Cancel 1 [HIT] or [CRIT] result for each Upgrade you discard with this card.

Ship.Title: Chang's Bird-of-Prey
Ship.Ability: If you attack with Torpedoes while Cloaked, you do not flip your [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.

Ship.Title: I.S.S. Defiant
Ship.Ability: Each time you suffer damage from an attack, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to reduce the amount of damage from that attack by 1.

Ship.Title: Scimitar
Ship.Ability: After you attack while Cloaked, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to keep your [CLOAK] Token from flipping to its red side.

Ship.Title: Cube 112
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire at up to 4 different ships at Range 1-2 with 4 attack dice against each ship. If you do this, spend 1 Drone Token for each of these attacks after the first.

Ship.Title: Fina Prime
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1 and force that ship to discard 1 of its Active Shield Tokens. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Terok Nor
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-3 with 4 attack dice.

Ship.Title: Deep Space 9
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may roll up to 2 additional defense dice. If you do, disable 1 of your Active Shields for each additional die you roll.

Ship.Title: 1st Wave Attack Fighters
Ship.Ability: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 5 During the Roll Attack Dice step, you may disable one of your [SQUADRON] Upgrade to gain +1 additional attack die for that attack.

Ship.Title: Dominion Attack Fighters
Ship.Ability: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 4

Ship.Title: Trager
Ship.Ability: During the Compare Results step, you may disable 1 of your Shields to cancel 1 [HIT] or [CRIT] result. You cannot deploy this card to the same fleet as "Assimilated Vessel 64758."

Ship.Title: Assimilated Vessel 64758
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Declare Target step, you may spend 1 Drone Token to set 1 of your defense dice on any side that you want. This die cannot be rolled or re-rolled during that attack.

Ship.Title: Regent's Flagship
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack with your Primary Weapon, you may fire in any direction at up to 2 enemy ships at Range 1 with 4 attack dice against each ship.

Ship.Title: Alpha Hunter
Ship.Ability: After you move, you may perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action with the 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver as a free Action, even if you are not Cloaked.

Ship.Title: Fighter Squadron 6
Ship.Ability: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 5 When attacking a ship at Range 1, if that ship has at least 1 damage to its Hull, during the Modify Attack Dice step, add 1 [HIT] result to your roll.

Ship.Title: Federation Attack Squadron
Ship.Ability: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 4

Ship.Title: Prototype 01
Ship.Ability: During the End Phase of each round, repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields (your choice). This ship may only be assigned Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

Ship.Title: Romulan Starship
Ship.Ability: This ship may only be assigned Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Pagh
Ship.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 of your [CRIT] results into a [HIT] result. If you do so, you may then convert 1 of your blank results into a [HIT] result.

Ship.Title: Ogla-Razik
Ship.Ability: All friendly Kazon ships with a Hull value of 4 or less within Range 1-2 of this ship gain +1 defense die.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Haakona
Ship.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon while cloaked, gain +1 attack die for every other Romulan Ship in your fleet (max +4).

Ship.Title: Gornarus
Ship.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if you inflict a Critical Damage to an enemy ship's hull, you may search the Damage Deck for a "Structural Damage" or a "Weapons Malfunction" card instead of drawing a random damage card. Reshuffle the deck when you are done.

Ship.Title: Reklar
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship. Each time you defend this round, roll +1 defense die.

Ship.Title: I.S.S. Enterprise
Ship.Ability: When attacking a ship that you already have target locked, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Sakharov
Ship.Ability: At the start of the game, during the Gather Forces Step, you may purchase 1 additional [TECH] Upgrade for this ship. This Upgrade may exceed the ship's restrictions and cost -2 SP (min 0).

Ship.Title: Sakharov
Ship.Ability: At the start of the game, during the Gather Forces Step, you may purchase 1 additional [CREW] Upgrade for this ship. This Upgrade may exceed the ship's restrictions and cost -2 SP (min 0).

Ship.Title: I.S.S. Avenger
Ship.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step, if there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, gain +2 attack dice when attacking with your Primary Weapon.

Ship.Title: Kyana Prime
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For every [EVADE] result, place 1 [EVADE] Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Hood
Ship.Ability: When you initiate an attack against a cloaked ship, roll +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Pegasus
Ship.Ability: All of your [TECH] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Ship.Title: Ratosha
Ship.Ability: After you move, if your ship is within Range 1 of a friendly ship you may perform a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Korinar
Ship.Ability: While you are cloaked, if you initiate an attack at Range 1 with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die for that attack.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Ning'tao
Ship.Ability: After performing a [SENSOR ECHO] Action, you may Come About (reverse direction). If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Prometheus
Ship.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a [STRAIGHT] Maneuver this round, immediately perform an additional 1 [STRAIGHT] or 2 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Dauntless
Ship.Ability: Each time you perform an Action or use an ability on any of your [TECH] Upgrades, place 1 Mission Token on this card. During the Roll Attack dice step, you may spend up to 2 of these tokens to gain +1 attack die for that attack for each token spent.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Terix
Ship.Ability: After you perform a Green Maneuver, you may immediately perform a [SCAN] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: Kreechta
Ship.Ability: When attacking a ship that has damaged Shields, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll a number of your Attack dice up to the number of the defending ship's damaged Shields.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Pasteur
Ship.Ability: After you perform a maneuver with a speed of 5 or greater, you may immediately perform an [EVADE] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. T'Ong
Ship.Ability: When attacking a ship with your Primary Weapon that has a larger Hull value and/or Primary Weapon value than your ship, gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Bellerophon
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may disable 2 of your Active Shields to cancel 1 of the attacking ship's [HIT] results.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Vrax
Ship.Ability: If you reveal a 4 [STRAIGHT] maneuver, immediately before you move, you may change it to a 4 Bank maneuver. Treat this as a Red Maneuver.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Thunderchild
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend, if you take no damage from an attack, you may immediately roll 1 attack die. A [HIT] or [CRIT] result damages the attacking ship.

Ship.Title: Bioship Beta
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may cancel 1 [HIT] result. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Quark's Treasure
Ship.Ability: You do not pay a faction penalty when assigning any [CREW] or [TECH] Upgrades to this ship. You do not place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship when using the "Docking" or "Launching" Actions.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Phoenix
Ship.Ability: Before you move, you may change your maneuver to another maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with the same speed. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Intrepid
Ship.Ability: When attacking a ship at Range 3, if there is a [SCAN] token beside your ship, the defending ship rolls -2 defense dice instead of -1.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Belak
Ship.Ability: When defending, you may re-roll 1 of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results. If your ship is cloaked, you may re-roll all of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results.

Ship.Title: Bioship Omega
Ship.Ability: During the Deal Damage step, if you inflict 2 critical damage to an enemy ship's hull, you may immediately flip those damage cards face down and rotate the damaged ship's facing by 90-degrees (right or left).

Ship.Title: Aldara
Ship.Ability: When a ship that started the Activation Phase in your forward arc moves, if you have not yet moved, you may immediately change your maneuver. You may only use this ability once per round.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Lakota
Ship.Ability: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into 1 [CRIT] result. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Toh'Kaht
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Place a [SCAN] Token and an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Diaspora
Ship.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step, if there is a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship, you may discard that Token to re-roll all of your attack dice.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Buruk
Ship.Ability: When defending, if your ship is not cloaked and there is a friendly ship within Range 1-2 of your ship, you may roll +1 defense die. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Interceptor 8
Ship.Ability: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, add +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: Nistrim-Culluh
Ship.Ability: When attacking a ship at Range 3, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die for every friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship (max +2).

Ship.Title: Seleya
Ship.Ability: When defending, if you have a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, roll +1 defense die.

Ship.Title: Nunk's Marauder
Ship.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may perform a [SCAN] Action as a free Action. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Federation Starship
Ship.Ability: You may deploy [WEAPON] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship.

Ship.Title: Delta Flyer
Ship.Ability: You may deploy [WEAPON] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship. You may fire your Primary Weapon from your rear firing arc at -1 attack die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Rotarran
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Perform a 2nd maneuver on your maneuver dial with a speed of 1 or 2. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. You cannot attack this round.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Talvath
Ship.Ability: ACTION: If you are within Range 1-3 of at least 1 enemy ship, roll 3 defense dice. For every [EVADE] result, place 1 [EVADE] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform any free Actions this round.

Ship.Title: Azati Prime
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard a Token from beside your ship ([EVADE], [SCAN], or [BATTLESTATIONS]) to force the attacking ship to roll 1 less attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Hathaway
Ship.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may perform a second Action from your Action Bar as a free Action. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Halik Raider
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may disable one of your Active Shields to gain +2 defense dice for that attack.

Ship.Title: Romulan Attack Fighters

Ship.Title: Scorpion 4
Ship.Ability: ATTACK SQUADRON TOKENS: 5 If you attack during a round in which you performed a Come About Maneuver, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results.

Ship.Title: Xindus
Ship.Ability: When firing a Photon Torpedo Upgrade, place 1 less Time Token on that Upgrade.

Ship.Title: Dominion Starship
Ship.Ability: You cannot assign a Captain or an Admiral to this ship.

Ship.Title: Dreadnought
Ship.Ability: You cannot assign a Captain or an Admiral to this ship. When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard up to 2 of your Upgrades to cancel an equal number of the attacking ship's dice.

Ship.Title: Robinson
Ship.Ability: When defending, if you are hit and you don't already have a "Warp Core Breach" critical damage card assigned to your ship, you may choose to ignore up to 3 damage being inflicted to your ship and suffer a "Warp Core Breach" critical damage instead.

Ship.Title: Denorios
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to cancel 1 [HIT] result.

Ship.Title: Weapon Zero
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may roll 1 defense die for each [HIT] or [CRIT] result rolled by the attacking ship. If you do so, place an auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. T'Met
Ship.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, when attacking with your Primary Weapon at Range 1 this round, gain +1 attack die and roll -1 defense die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Valiant
Ship.Ability: When attacking with Photon Torpedoes, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard the Photon Torpedoes Upgrade to gain 1 additional attack die.

Ship.Title: Kumari
Ship.Ability: You may perform an [EVADE] or a [SCAN] Action while there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Pi
Ship.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may perform a [SCAN] Action as a free Action. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Montgolfier

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Amar
Ship.Ability: When attacking, if you do not hit the defending ship, place an [EVADE] Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Jazkal
Ship.Ability: While there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, you cannot be targeted by any [ELITE TALENT] Upgrades and you roll +1 defense die against all attacks made with [WEAPON] Upgrades.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Constellation
Ship.Ability: If all of your Shields have been destroyed, when attacking with your Primary Weapon, you may gain +2 attack dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. You cannot roll any defense dice during a round in which you use this ability.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Reliant
Ship.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may disable any number of your Active Shields to re-roll a number of your attack dice equal to the number of Shields you disabled.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Drovana
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard 1 of your non-disabled Upgrades to cancel 1 [HIT] or [CRIT] result.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Algeron
Ship.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if your ship is not Cloaked, during the Declare Target step, you may perform a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver before choosing an enemy ship to attack.

Ship.Title: Kruge's Bird-of-Prey
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Once this round, if you inflict a critical damage on an enemy ship's Hull, you may search the Damage Deck for a "Direct Hit" damage card and place it beside the enemy's Ship Card. Shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done.

Ship.Title: Sphere 936
Ship.Ability: If this ship is a support ship, you may equip 1 Upgrade (of your choice) at -2 SP to this ship and you may use a 1 [STRAIGHT], 2 [STRAIGHT] or a 3 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template to place it in the play area when it becomes Active.

Ship.Title: Cube 384
Ship.Ability: Your shields cannot be affected by Upgrades from an opponent's fleet.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-A
Ship.Ability: When attacking, during the Roll Attack Dice step, if there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, gain +1 attack die (+2 if the defending ship is Cloaked).

Ship.Title: H.M.S. Bounty
Ship.Ability: If there are only Federation cards assigned to this ship, add the [SCAN] and [BATTLESTATIONS] icons to the Action Bar. This ship cannot be in the same fleet as Kruge's Bird-of-Prey.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Cairo
Ship.Ability: When defending, if there is an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, during the Roll Defence Dice step, roll +1 defense die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Venture
Ship.Ability: If you attack a ship that is in the forward firing arc of another friendly ship, you gain +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Rateg
Ship.Ability: When defending, if your ship is Cloaked, you may re-roll up to 2 of your defense dice.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-B
Ship.Ability: During the Combat Phase, you may replace 1 [BATTLESTATIONS], [SCAN] or blue [TARGET LOCK] Token that is beside your ship with an [EVADE] Token.

Ship.Title: Kohlar's Battle Cruiser
Ship.Ability: During the End Phase, if your [CLOAK] Token is on its red side, you may flip it back to its green side. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Bortas
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Modify Defense step, you may re-roll one of your defense dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Orassin
Ship.Ability: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may spend your [BATTLESTATIONS] Token to convert one of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Hegh'ta
Ship.Ability: If your ship is within Range 1 of a friendly ship, each time that ship defends, it rolls +1 defense die. This ability may only be used for 1 friendly ship per round.

Ship.Title: Sela's Warbird
Ship.Ability: During the Activation Phase, if your ship is Cloaked and performs a [SENSOR ECHO] Action, you may flip your [CLOAK] Token over to its red side and immediately perform an additional [SENSOR ECHO] Action as a free Action.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Toral
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Roll Defense Dice step, if your ship is not Cloaked, you may roll +2 defense dice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Ship.Title: Calindra
Ship.Ability: When defending, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may discard a blue [TARGET LOCK] Token from beside your ship to re-roll all of your defense dice.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
Ship.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice or Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may switch an [EVADE], [SCAN], or [TARGET LOCK] Token that is beside your ship for a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Defiant NCC-1764
Ship.Ability: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results.

Ship.Title: Muratas
Ship.Ability: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may disable one of your Active Shields to re-roll up to 2 of your attack dice.

Ship.Title: Delta Flyer II
Ship.Ability: You may deploy [WEAPON] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship. You may place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship to perform a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action.

Ship.Title: Prototype 02
Ship.Ability: PLANNING PHASE: Place an [AUX] Token beside this ship. Remove 1 [TIME] Token from each [TECH] Upgrade equipped to this ship. This ship may only be equipped with Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

Ship.Title: Romulan Starship
Ship.Ability: This ship may only be assigned Gareb or a Romulan Drone Pilot as its Captain.

Ship.Title: Dreadnought
Ship.Ability: You cannot equip a Captain or Admiral to this ship. While this ship has no damage cards, treat its Captain Skill as 12.

Ship.Title: Dominion Starship
Ship.Ability: You cannot equip a Captain or Admiral to this ship.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Ves Batlh
Ship.Ability: WHEN THIS SHIP SUFFERS DAMAGE FROM AN OBSTACLE OR MINEFIELD: Reduce the damage by 1.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Grissom
Ship.Ability:
WHEN THIS SHIP WOULD BE DESTROYED:
The attacking ship must discard one [CREW] Upgrade. If it can't, place an [AUX] Token beside it.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Suran
Ship.Ability: COMBAT PHASE: After this ship attacks: This ship may perform a 2 [GREEN BANK LEFT] or a 2 [GREEN BANK RIGHT] Maneuver.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
Ship.Ability: WHEN DEFENDING: The attacking ship rolls -1 attack die.

Ship.Title: 3rd Division Battle Cruiser
Ship.Ability: Jem'Hadar Attack Ships within Range 1 roll +1 defense dice.

Ship.Title: K'Mpec's Attack Cruiser
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Target all Cloaked friendly ships within Range 1-2. Place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside all target ships.

Ship.Title: Jarok's Scout Vessel
Ship.Ability: ACTIVATION PHASE: Place 2 [TIME] Tokens on this card and target a friendly [ROMULAN] ship within Range 1. The target ship may perform an Action as a Free Action.

Ship.Title: 2nd Wing Patrol Ship
Ship.Ability: This ship rolls +2 defense dice if there is another Jem'Hadar Attack Ship within Range 1.

Ship.Title: Mirok's Science Vessel
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Target a friendly ship within Range 1-2. Repair 1 Shield or 1 Hull on the target ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Sutherland
Ship.Ability: WHEN DEFENDING: Cancel 1 [HIT].

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Each round you may perform one of the following actions as a free action: [EVASIVE] [TARGET LOCK] [SCAN] [BATTLE STATIONS]. You may use this action even if your ship does not have it in the Action bar.

Captain.Title: William T. Riker
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If you are attacked this round at Range 1, Roll 2 attack dice. Any [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result damages the attacking ship as normal, even if your ship is destroyed by their attack. The attacking ship does not roll any defense dice.

Captain.Title: Nu'Daq
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 [BATTLE STATIONS] result into a [HIT] result.

Captain.Title: Toreth
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 [HIT] result into a [CRITICAL] result.

Captain.Title: Khan Singh
Captain.Ability: You may use any Upgrades without paying a faction penalty. During an attack, if you spend a [BATTLE STATIONS] Token, each of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results become a [CRITICAL] instead of a [HIT].

Captain.Title: Khan Singh
Captain.Ability: (Gen-Con Promo) You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Khan or any Talent Upgrade to your ship. If any Captain in play has a higher Skill Number than Khan, Khan's Skill Number equals that Captains Skill Number.

Captain.Title: Clark Terrell
Captain.Ability: Any friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship gains +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: James T. Kirk
Captain.Ability: Any Federation [TALENT] Upgrades you purchase for Kirk cost exactly 3 Squadron Points and are placed face down beside his card. Each Talent remains face down until you decide to use it, and then it is turned face up for the rest of the game.

Captain.Title: Christopher Pike
Captain.Ability: All of your [CREW] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

Captain.Title: Donatra
Captain.Ability: All other friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gains +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Tomalak
Captain.Ability: When firing at Range 3 the defending ship does not roll an extra defense die.

Captain.Title: Mirok
Captain.Ability: After you move, if at least one friendly ship is within Range 1 of your ship, repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

Captain.Title: Koloth
Captain.Ability: Each time an enemy ship attacks you, you may force that ship to re-roll 1 attack die of your choice.

Captain.Title: Krell
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: After you move, choose 1 friendly ship within Range 1-2 whose Captain has a lower Skill than Martok's. The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free Action.

Captain.Title: Gowron
Captain.Ability: ACTION:All other friendly Klingon ships within Range 1-2 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round.

Captain.Title: Gul Ranor
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 [STRAIGHT] or 2 [STRAIGHT] maneuver. Place an Auxiliary Power Token next to your ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Danar
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 blank result.

Captain.Title: Thot Gor
Captain.Ability: All your [WEAPON] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

Captain.Title: Sar
Captain.Ability: When defending, your ship rolls 1 extra defense die.

Captain.Title: Daimon Tog
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 of your non-disabled Crew Upgrades and then disable 1 Crew Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target all friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship whose Captains have a lower Skill than Martok's. The target ships gain +1 attack die and may re-roll 1 of their attack dice this round.

Captain.Title: Letant
Captain.Ability: Each round, when defending, you may force one opponent to re-roll one of their [CRITICAL] results.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Sisko
Captain.Ability: Once per round, you may re-roll any one of your attack or defense dice.

Captain.Title: Kira Nerys
Captain.Ability: If a [CREW] Upgrade on an enemy ship would cause your ship to discard or disable any of your Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVASIVE] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Kira Nerys to a Federation ship.

Captain.Title: Gorkon
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable Gorkon to perform this Action. Your ship and every ship that attacks you this round rolls 2 less attack dice.

Captain.Title: Chang
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Spend your target lock to perform this action. Disable the Captain Card on the ship that was target locked.

Captain.Title: Valdore
Captain.Ability: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, add +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Weyoun
Captain.Ability: Disable Weyoun to prevent 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades from being disabled or discarded this round.

Captain.Title: Luaran
Captain.Ability: One of your Dominion Upgrades costs -2 Squadron Points.

Captain.Title: Worf
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Kurn
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Dukat
Captain.Ability: Your ship may perform an [EVASIVE] or a [BATTLE STATIONS] Action as a free Action each round.

Captain.Title: Gul Evek
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Data
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable one of your [CREW] upgrades and one of your [WEAPON] upgrades to target all cloaked ship at range 1-3. They immediately flip their cloak tokens to the red side.

Captain.Title: Alidar Jarok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Discard your [TALENT] upgrade to target 1 ship at range 1-2. Neither of your ships may attack each other this round.

Captain.Title: Hikaru Sulu
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable one of your [CREW] upgrades to remove an opponent's [TARGET LOCK] token from your ship. Remove the corresponding token from the opponent's ship as well.

Captain.Title: Styles
Captain.Ability: Add 1 additional [TECH] icon to your ship's upgrade bar.

Captain.Title: Thot Pran
Captain.Ability: When Attacking with an Energy Dissipator, you may re-roll 1 of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Rudolph Ransom
Captain.Ability: When defending, if there is an [EVASIVE] token beside your ship, roll +2 defense dice.

Captain.Title: Maxwell Burke
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to gain +2 attack dice this round.

Captain.Title: Somraw Commander
Captain.Ability: Each time you attack at Range 3, if you do not have an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship, you may add +1 attack die. If you add the attack die, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Romulan Commander
Captain.Ability: ACTION: During the Combat Phase this round, your ship attacks before every other ship. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Weyoun
Captain.Ability: Add up to 2 additional [CREW] Upgrade slots to you ship's Upgrade Bar. The cost of these Upgrades is -1 SP each if they are Dominion [CREW] Upgrades.

Captain.Title: Gelnon
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target an enemy ship in your forward firing arc within Range 1 and immediately roll 2 attack dice. The target ship does not toll any defense dice against this attack and sustains damage as normal for each [HIT] or [CRITICAL]. If you roll at least 1 [BATTLE STATIONS] result, place a [BATTLE STATIONS] Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Kira Nerys
Captain.Ability: ACTION: All other friendly ships within Range 1-2 of your ship may immediately perform a [TARGET LOCK] Action as a Free Action, if possible.

Captain.Title: Tahna Los
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] icon to your ship's upgrade bar. One of the [TECH] upgrades you purchase for Tahna Los's ship costs exactly 3 squadron points and is placed face down beside his card; this upgrade cannot refer to a specific ship or class of ship. This upgrade remains face down until you decide to use it, and then it is turned face up for the rest of the game.

Captain.Title: Kathryn Janeway
Captain.Ability: When your ship performs an [EVASIVE], [SCAN] or [BATTLE STATIONS] Action, you may place an additional token of the appropriate type beside your ship. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable Chakotay to allow two different crew Upgrades to perform their Actions during the same Round.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 4 Drone Tokens on this card. When attacking, you may spend 1 Drone Token to choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Captain.Title: Culluh
Captain.Ability: After you move, you may discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to perform one of the Actions listed on your Action Bar as a free Action this round.

Captain.Title: Rettik
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, you may re-roll 1 of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Bioship Alpha Pilot
Captain.Ability: Each round during the Planning Phase, after all other players have chosen their Maneuvers, target a ship within Range 1 of your ship, look at that ship's chosen Maneuver, and then choose your Maneuver. the target ship's player cannot change the chosen Maneuver after you have looked at it. You may not perform any Actions the round you use this ability.

Captain.Title: Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 Drone Token on this card.

Captain.Title: Loskene
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target 1 friendly ship that is not within Range 1-3 of your ship and whose Captain has a lower Skill than Loskene's. Target ship may immediately perform an additional 1 or 2 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn). The additional Maneuver must be on the target ship's Maneuver Dial.

Captain.Title: Soval
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2. Remove 1 [SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] Token from beside the target ship. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Tavek
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar.

Captain.Title: Lenaris Holem
Captain.Ability: Each time you are attacked, if you have an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship, you may re-roll 1 of your defense dice.

Captain.Title: Hazar
Captain.Ability: If your ship is within Range 1 of a Planet Token or an Obstacle, all attacks made against your ship are at -1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. After you spend a [TARGET LOCK] Token to re-roll your dice, you may spend 3 Drone Tokens to maintain your Target Lock on the target ship (i.e., do not remove the [TARGET LOCK] Tokens from beside either ship).

Captain.Title: Borg Queen
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 8 Drone Tokens on this card. Once per round, you may discard 1 Drone Token to perform 1 Action from your ship's Action Bar as a free Action. If another Borg ship is in your fleet when your ship is destroyed, you may replace that ship's Captain Card with this card. If you do so, discard that Captain Card and all Drone Tokens from both cards. Then place 8 Drone Tokens on this card.

Captain.Title: Gorn Commander
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [HIT] result.

Captain.Title: K'Nera
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. The target ship may choose to disable one of its [CREW] Upgrades (of its choice). If the target ship chooses not to disable 1 of its [CREW] Upgrades or if it has no [CREW] Upgrades that are not already disabled, you gain +1 attack die to all of your attacks against that ship this round.

Captain.Title: Liviana Charvanek
Captain.Ability: Whenever one of your [CREW] Upgrades is supposed to be disabled, roll 1 defense die. If you roll a [BATTLESTATIONS] result, that Upgrade is not disabled. If you are disabling the [CREW] Upgrade to perform its Action or ability, that Action or ability is still performed even if the Upgrade does not disable.

Captain.Title: Michael Eddington
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 3 Mission Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a ship a Range 1-3 and discard 1 Mission Token from this card. Target ship rolls -2 attack dice against your ship for each of its attacks this round.

Captain.Title: Gul Damar
Captain.Ability: All attacks made against your ship with Secondary Weapons are at -1 attack die. All attacks made against your ship with Minefields are at -2 attack dice.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Maxwell
Captain.Ability: Immediately before you move, you may change your Maneuver. If you do so, discard this card during the End Phase.

Captain.Title: Mr. Spock
Captain.Ability: Your ship may perform a [TARGET LOCK] or [SCAN] Action as a free Action each round.

Captain.Title: Will Decker
Captain.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may destroy one of your Active Shields to add 1 additional [CRIT] result to your attack roll.

Captain.Title: Hugh
Captain.Ability: All of your [CREW] Upgrades cost -1 SP. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any Borg Upgrades to your ship.

Captain.Title: Lore
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die for that attack. You may assign any [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade to your ship, regardless of Faction restriction, and you do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning any [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade to your ship.

Captain.Title: Keevan
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2 in your forward firing arc. Your ship cannot attack any other ship this round and must attack that ship, if possible. During the Combat Phase, if your ship attacks with its Primary Weapon, it resolves its attack immediately before the target ship, as if it had a higher Captain Skill than that ship. If the target ship attacks your ship this round, it gains +4 attack dice.

Captain.Title: Weyoun
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 2 Mission Tokens on this card. ACTION: Spend 1 Mission Token from this card to target a ship within Range 1-3 of your ship. Target ship cannot attack your ship this round. You cannot attack this round.

Captain.Title: Vanik
Captain.Ability: All of your Vulcan and Federation [TECH] Upgrades cost -2 SP.

Captain.Title: James T. Kirk
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable one Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Dukat
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon this round, gain +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Magnus Hansen
Captain.Ability: During the Modify Defense Dice step of the combat phase, you may spend 1 [SCAN] token to add 1 additional [EVASIVE] result to your defense roll. You do not pay a faction penalty when assigning Magnus to a Federation ship.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Sisko
Captain.Ability: During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, if your ship is in the forward firing arc of 2 or more ships, roll 1 extra defense die against all attacks from those ships. Each time your ship receives a Damage Card (normal or critical), increase your Captain Skill by +1 for the rest of the game (max +2). The bonus Skill remains even if the damage is later repaired.

Captain.Title: Jonathan Archer
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Disable up to 2 of your [CREW] Upgrades. For each [CREW] Upgrade you disabled with this Action, gain +1 attack die when attacking with your Primary Weapon AND increase your Skill Number by +1 until the End Phase.

Captain.Title: J. Hayes
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die this round. At the end of the Combat Phase, suffer 1 normal damage to your Hull.

Captain.Title: Maxwell Forrest
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 Maneuver (straight, bank or turn).

Captain.Title: Sopek
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Choose 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades that was discarded from your ship on a previous round. Re-deploy that [CREW] Upgrade to your ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Kuvak
Captain.Ability: After you move, if you perform an [EVADE] Action, you may place 2 [EVADE] Tokens beside your ship instead of 1 if your ship is not in the forward firing arc of any enemy ships.

Captain.Title: V'Las
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. Disable 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Third of Five
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 3 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 Drone Token to roll +1 defense die. You cannot assign this card to the same ship or fleet as Hugh.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 2 Drone Tokens on this card. Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 Drone Token to roll 1 attack die. A [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result damages the attacking ship as normal. The attacking ship does not roll any defense dice against this.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Disable all of your remaining Shields and immediately perform an additional green or white maneuver.

Captain.Title: William T. Riker
Captain.Ability: Each time you perform a [BATTLESTATIONS], an [EVASIVE MANEUVERS], or a [TARGET LOCK] Action, place 1 additional Token of the appropriate type ([BATTLESTATIONS], [EVASIVE MANEUVERS], or [TARGET LOCK]) on this card. During the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 Token from this card and perform the corresponding Action as a free Action.

Captain.Title: Bok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die to each of your attacks and roll -1 defense die each time you defend this round.

Captain.Title: Elim Garak
Captain.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to roll +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Haron
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. All of your Kazon [WEAPON] Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 2 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Activation Phase, before you move, you may spend 1 Drone Token to remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token from beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Solok
Captain.Ability: You may perform an [EVASIVE MANEUVERS] or a [SCAN] Action as a free Action each round. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TALENT] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Salatrel
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. For the rest of the game, during each Combat Phase, if a ship of that Faction is in your forward firing arc, treat your Captain Skill Number as if it were a 10 until the End Phase of that round.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade bar (your choice). ACTION: Perform a 2nd Maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with a number of 3 or less. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If the extra Maneuver is a Red Maneuver, place a 2nd Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade to your Upgrade bar (your choice). ACTION: Perform a 2nd Maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with a number of 3 or less. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If the extra Maneuver is a Red Maneuver, place a 2nd Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 5 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 of your Drone Tokens to force your opponent to roll 1 less defense die.

Captain.Title: Borg Queen
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game or if this card replaces another Captain, remove all Drone Tokens from that Captain Card and place 7 Drone Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2. Choose 1 Upgrade on that ship and perform that Upgrade's Action as a free Action this round. If that Action requires spending Drone Tokens, spend 1 less Drone Token than required.

Captain.Title: Matthew Dougherty
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Miles O'Brien
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Repair 1 Damage to your Hull or Shields.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Sisko
Captain.Ability: During the Roll Attack Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may discard up to 2 of your Upgrades ([CREW], [TECH] or [WEAPON]). If you do so, gain +1 attack die to that attack for each Upgrade you discarded with this card.

Captain.Title: Viceroy
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 2 Mission Tokens on this card. During the Planning Phase, after all other ships have chosen their Maneuvers, you may discard 1 of the Mission Tokens from this card to target a ship at Range 1, look at that ship's Maneuver dial, and then select your Maneuver. The target ship cannot change its chosen Maneuver after you look at it.

Captain.Title: Shinzon
Captain.Ability: During the Gather Forces step of Setup, instead of purchasing an [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade as normal for Shinzon, you may spend 4 SP to place up to 4 Romulan [ELITE TALENT] Upgrades face down beside this card. These cards remain face down until you decide to use one of them. When you do so, select the one you want to use and turn it face up for the rest of the game. Then discard the other 3.

Captain.Title: Chang
Captain.Ability: During the Activation Phase, if your ship is Cloaked, before you move you may perform an additional [SENSOR ECHO] Action (with a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template) as a free Action. If you do so, you may still perform a normal [SENSOR ECHO] Action after you move, during the Perform Actions step.

Captain.Title: Kerla
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, during the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice to add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll.

Captain.Title: Borg Queen
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 9 Drone Tokens on this card. Add 1 [BORG] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1 and spend 6 Drone Tokens. Disable 2 Upgrades of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Korok
Captain.Ability: When you initiate an attack against a ship at Range 1, at the start of the Deal Damage step of the Combat Phase, disable 1 Active Shield on the target ship (if possible).

Captain.Title: Korok
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card. When you inflict damage to an opponent's Hull, during the Deal Damage step, you may spend 1 Drone Token to convert 1 Normal Damage into 1 Critical Damage.

Captain.Title: Gorkon
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For each [EVADE] result, place 1 [EVADE] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform an [EVADE] Action as a free Action this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Roll 3 defense dice. For each [EVADE] result, place 1 [EVADE] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform an [EVADE] Action as a free Action this round.

Captain.Title: Hiren
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Disable 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die this round.

Captain.Title: Gul Macet
Captain.Ability: When attacking, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may add +1 attack die to your roll. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability:
At the start of the game, place 6 Drone Tokens on this card.
When a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship is defending, during the Roll Defence Dice step, you may spend 1 Drone Token to add +1 defence die to that ship's roll for that attack.

Captain.Title: Locutus
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 9 Drone Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-3 and spend up to 2 of your Drone Tokens. Disable 1 Active Shield on the target ship for each Drone Token you spent with this Action. You cannot deploy this card to the same ship or fleet as "Jean-Luc Picard."

Captain.Title: Vidiian Commander
Captain.Ability: You may add +1 attack die when you initiate an attack with the Grappler or Hypothermic Charge [WEAPON] Upgrades or when performing the Action listed on the Vidiian Boarding Party [CREW] Upgrade.

Captain.Title: Kira Nerys
Captain.Ability: When a [CREW] Upgrade on an enemy ship within Range 1-2 of your ship performs an Action that would affect your ship, you may disable this card to prevent that Action from taking effect. If you do this, the enemy ship cannot take another Action that round. If the enemy [CREW] Upgrade was disabled to perform the Action, it remains disabled. If the enemy [CREW] Upgrade was discarded to perform the Action, disable it instead.

Captain.Title: Worf
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 with a Hull Value of 3 or less. The target ship immediately makes one free attack with its Primary Weapon against an enemy ship in its forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliarly Power Token beside the target ship.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 with a Hull Value of 3 or less. The target ship immediately makes one free attack with its Primary Weapon against an enemy ship in its forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliarly Power Token beside the target ship.

Captain.Title: Karr
Captain.Ability: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll any 1 of your attack dice twice. In addition, if your Captain's Skill is greater than the target ship's Skill Number, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Alpha Hirogen
Captain.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, you may convert 1 of your blank results into a [HIT] result.

Captain.Title: Gareb
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, after set up, place a Captain Card under this card so that the Skill Number is visible. This is the Captain Skill of this Card. The cost of this card is the cost of the Captain Card at -3 SP (Min 0). Gareb can field 1 [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade for each [ELITE TALENT] icon on the Captain Card. This card cannot be affected by anything that affects Captain Cards and my only be purchased for a Romulan Drone Ship.

Captain.Title: Romulan Drone Pilot
Captain.Ability: This card cannot be affected by anything that affects Captain Cards and may only be assigned to a Romulan Drone Ship

Captain.Title: Valdore
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. When attacking, you may discard 1 of your [TECH] Upgrades to gain +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Kargan
Captain.Ability: During the Activation Phase, after you move, if you perform an Action listed on one of your Upgrades, you may immediately perform a [TARGET LOCK] Action as a free Action, if possible. If you do this, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Tholian Pilot
Captain.Ability:
ACTION: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, repair 1 Shield Token.
You may only use this Action if this card is equipped to a Tholian ship.

Captain.Title: Razik
Captain.Ability: Disable 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to re-roll one of your attack or defense dice. OR Discard 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to re-roll any number of your attack or defense dice.

Captain.Title: Jabin
Captain.Ability: When defending, your ship rolls +1 defense dice.

Captain.Title: Taris
Captain.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Declare Target step, you may discard one of your [CREW] Upgrades to target a ship that is not in your forward firing arc.

Captain.Title: Centurion
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll one of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results.

Captain.Title: Mendak
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 (including your own) that has no [BATTLESTATIONS] Token(s) beside it and place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside that ship. The target ship cannot perform a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action this round. This card may only be purchased for a Romulan ship.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a friendly ship at Range 1-2 (including your own) that has no [BATTLESTATIONS] Token(s) beside it and place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside that ship. The target ship cannot perform a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action this round. This card may only be purchased for a Romulan ship.

Captain.Title: S'Sesslak
Captain.Ability: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result OR 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [HIT] result.

Captain.Title: Slar
Captain.Ability: You may field the "Salvage" [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade.

Captain.Title: Gul Lemec
Captain.Ability: When attacking a ship whose Captain has a lower Skill number than Gul Lemec's, gain +1 attack die against that ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Ocett
Captain.Ability: If you damage an opponent's Hull with a [CRIT], you may search the Damage Deck for a "Power Disruption" or a "Minor Explosion" card instead of drawing a random Damage Card. Re-shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done.

Captain.Title: Gul Madred
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. If the Captain on the target ship has a lower Skill number than Gul Madred, discard that ship's Captain and Gul Madred. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number equal to or greater than Gul Madred, that Captain rolls 2 defense dice. If at least 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result is rolled, do not discard that ship's Captain or Gul Madred.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number of 6 or less, discard that ship's Captain and Gul Madred. If the Captain on the target ship has a Skill number of 7 or higher, that Captain rolls 2 defense dice. If at least 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result is rolled, do not discard that ship's Captain or Gul Madred.

Captain.Title: James T. Kirk
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable up to 3 of your Upgrades (your choice) to gain +1 attack die on your next attack for each Upgrade you disabled with this Action.

Captain.Title: Mr. Spock
Captain.Ability: During the Activation Phase, you may perform one of the Actions listed on any of your Upgrades as a free Action. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Data
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 [EVASIVE MANEUVERS], 1 [SCAN], and 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] Token on this card. During the Activation Phase, you may take 1 of these Tokens off this card and place it beside your ship, even if there is already one there.

Captain.Title: Soval
Captain.Ability: You do not pay a faction penalty when deploying any Upgrades to your ship.

Captain.Title: Black
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action with a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template, even if your ship is not cloaked or does not have the [SENSOR ECHO] icon on its Action Bar. Each time you defend this round, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll one of your blank results. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action with a 1 [STRAIGHT] Maneuver Template, even if your ship is not cloaked or does not have the [SENSOR ECHO] icon on its Action Bar. Each time you defend this round, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll one of your blank results. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Gardner
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die this round. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll -1 defense die. You cannot perform free Actions this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, gain +1 attack die this round. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll -1 defense die. You cannot perform free Actions this round.

Captain.Title: Annorax
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. If Annorax is assigned to a Krenim weapon ship, any time you roll dice, for any reason, you may disable 1 of your Upgrades to choose one of those dice and re-roll it.

Captain.Title: Obrist
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 Mission Token on this card. ACTION: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, discard the Mission Token from this card and 1 of your [WEAPON] Upgrade to target a ship at Range 1-2. You cannot attack or be attacked by that ship this round. You cannot perform any free Actions this round.

Captain.Title: Robert DeSoto
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, you may re-roll a number of your defense dice equal to the number of [CREW] Upgrades assigned to your ship (max 3 dice).

Captain.Title: Ronald Moore
Captain.Ability: If your ship has a Hull Value of 3 or less, during the Activation Phase, you may disable this card to place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Day Kannu
Captain.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may set one of your attack dice on the result of your choice. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. This die cannot be rolled or re-rolld during the round you use this ability.

Captain.Title: Krim
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. When defending, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may re-roll 1 of your defense dice for every damage card assigned to your ship (max 3 dice).

Captain.Title: Erik Pressman
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your [TECH] Upgrade to gain +1 attack die with your Primary Weapon this round. OR ACTION: Discard 1 of your [TECH] Upgrades to gain +2 attack dice with your Primary Weapon this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Disable 1 of your [TECH] Upgrade to gain +1 attack die with your Primary Weapon this round. OR FLEET ACTION: Discard 1 of your [TECH] Upgrades to gain +2 attack dice with your Primary Weapon this round.

Captain.Title: Jaro Essa
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Discard 1 of your Bajoran [CREW] Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll 2 additional dice. This card may only be purchased for a Bajoran ship.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Discard 1 of your Bajoran [CREW] Upgrades to perform this Action. Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, roll 2 additional dice. This card may only be purchased for a Bajoran ship.

Captain.Title: Kurn
Captain.Ability: You do not pay a faction penalty when assigning Kurn to any ship. Kurn may field the "Mauk-to'Vor" [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade at a cost of 3 SP.

Captain.Title: The Doctor
Captain.Ability: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may attempt to increase your Skill Number. If you do so, roll 1 attack die. If you roll a [HIT] or [CRIT] result, your Captain Skill is a 10 until the End Phase. Otherwise, your Captain Skill is a 0 until the End Phase. Either way, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Kor
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [CREW] Upgrade Slot to your Upgrade Bar. Each time you attack, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may select any number of attack dice (up to the number of non-disabled [CREW] Upgrades assigned to your ship) and re-roll those dice once.

Captain.Title: Worf
Captain.Ability: When defending, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may roll up to 2 additional defense dice. If you do so, place 1 Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship for each extra die you rolled.

Captain.Title: Kor
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not cloaked, all enemy ships at Range 1-3 must attack your ship this round, if possible. When defending against each of these attacks, roll +2 defense dice.

Captain.Title: Rekar
Captain.Ability: When attacking with a Secondary Weapon, you may add +1 attack die to the attack. If you do so, discard that [WEAPON] Upgrade after the attack is completed.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, gain +1 attack die and roll -2 defense dice this round. You may convert 1 of your [HIT] results into a [CRIT] result.

Captain.Title: Arturis
Captain.Ability: Arturis's Captain Skill is +5 if he is assigned to a Dauntless class ship. ACTION: Target a ship at Range 2-3. Disable either the Captain Card or up to 2 [CREW] Upgrades on the target ship (your choice). Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Tomalak
Captain.Ability: When attacking with your Primary Weapon, if there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results once.

Captain.Title: Q (Female)
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Place 1 additional Shield Token beside your ship. When taking damage this round, remove this Shield Token first. If all of your Shields are destroyed by a single attack this round and your ship suffers any damage to it's Hull from that attack, the damage is increased by +1 normal damage. If the Shield Token is unused remove it during the End Phase.

Captain.Title: Tarr
Captain.Ability: At the start of the Combat Phase, if your ship is in the forward firing arc of an enemy ship and you do not have a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship, you may place a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Bractor
Captain.Ability: When attacking a ship that has an Auxiliary Power Token beside it, gain +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Beverly Crusher
Captain.Ability: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, each time you defend this round, you may convert 1 of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results into an [EVADE] result.

Captain.Title: Worf
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Roll +1 attack die and +1 defense die this round. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Q
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Rotate your ship 180-degrees. Place a number of Auxiliary Power tokens beside your ship equal to the speed of the maneuver you revealed this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Rotate your ship 180-degrees. Place a number of Auxiliary Power tokens beside your ship equal to the speed of the maneuver you revealed this round.

Captain.Title: William T. Riker
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Place a [SCAN] Token beside your ship. You may then perform 1 Action from your Upgrade Bar as a free Action. You cannot perform the [SCAN] Action as a free Action this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Place a [SCAN] Token beside your ship. You may then perform 1 Action from your Upgrade Bar as a free Action. You cannot perform the [SCAN] Action as a free Action this round.

Captain.Title: K'Temoc
Captain.Ability: All of your Klingon Upgrades cost -1 SP. The faction penalty is doubled for any non-Klingon Upgrades assigned to your ship. K'Temoc may only field Klingon [ELITE TALENT] Upgrades.

Captain.Title: Morag
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 Upgrade of your choice on the target ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Suran
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step, if you are within range 1 of a friendly ship, set 1 of your attack dice on the result of your choice. This die cannot be rolled or re-rolled.

Captain.Title: William Ross
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2 that is in your forward firing arc. If the target ship attacks this round, that ship rolls 1 less attack die this round.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2 that is in your forward firing arc. If the target ship attacks this round, that ship rolls 1 less attack die this round.

Captain.Title: Velal
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll.

Captain.Title: Shanthi
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. When attacking that ship this round, you may re-roll all of your blank results once. In addition, if the target ship is Cloaked, immediately flip that ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. When attacking that ship this round, you may re-roll all of your blank results once. In addition, if the target ship is Cloaked, immediately flip that ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.

Captain.Title: Hayes
Captain.Ability: ACTION: All friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round (+2 attack dice against Borg ships).
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: All friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round (+2 attack dice against Borg ships).

Captain.Title: Bioship Beta Pilot
Captain.Ability: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll 1 of your blank results. If your ship was just destroyed and another friendly ship is within Range 1-2 of your ship, you may replace that ship's Captain Card with this card. If this Captain fielded an [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade, you may assign that Upgrade to the new ship as well, if possible.

Captain.Title: Quark
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Discard all of your Upgrades to target a ship at Range 1-2. Target ship cannot attack your ship this round. You must discard at least 1 Upgrade to use this Action. You cannot attack or perform any free Actions this round.

Captain.Title: Brunt
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When defending this round, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may force 1 opposing ship to re-roll 1 of its attack dice (your choice). You may field the Grand Nagus [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade. If you use the Action listed on it, you must discard this card as well.

Captain.Title: Zek
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 of your Upgrades and 1 Upgrade (your choice) on the target ship. This card may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 of your Upgrades and 1 Upgrade (your choice) on the target ship. This card may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Maxwell
Captain.Ability: When attacking a ship with one of your secondary weapons, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll and 1 of your Attack dice.

Captain.Title: Haden
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2 that does not have your ship in its forward firing arc. If you attack that ship this round, gain +1 attack die and roll 1 less defense die.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2 that does not have your ship in its forward firing arc. If you attack that ship this round, gain +1 attack die and roll 1 less defense die.

Captain.Title: Lovok
Captain.Ability: During the Modify Attack Dice step, you may re-roll all of your blank results. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. Lovok may field the "Tal Shiar" [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade.

Captain.Title: Matt Decker
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ship gains +1 attack die this round and suffers 1 damage to its Hull.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 of your ship (including your ship). Target ship gains +1 attack die this round and suffers 1 damage to its Hull.

Captain.Title: Bioship Omega Pilot
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card and 2 of your Active Shields to target a ship at Range 1. Inflict 1 critical damage to the target ship's hull. This card may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Jasad
